{"title":"Page 8","subjec":{},"descri":{},"creato":{},"publis":{},"date":{},"year":{},"format":{},"reposi":{},"collec":{},"reposa":{},"rights":{},"digitb":{},"langua":{},"topics":{},"cite":{},"notes":{},"notesa":{},"source":{},"box":{},"folder":{},"identi":{},"relati":{},"findin":{},"catalo":{},"type":{},"full":"ville, in the parish of Lafourche Interior, I there
met the result of the proceedings of a convention
held in this city, in which it was proposed to refer
all such improvements to the future legislation of
the State, and to rely for means of their construction on taxation. Not knowing how far this decision of that convention might compromise the
gentlemen interested in the Algiers road, I deemed
it my duty to return immediately and report the
facts ; and to inform them that this road possessed
the elements of its own success so eminently, in
the gallant sons of Louisiana scattered along the
line, that it could be carried through independent
of all such conclusions; that; a simple statement of
the business now annually transacted by this
section, would tell the tale of its value, in such
way as would command the attention of capitalists any where; that, indeed, if necessary,ihe. country would take the whole stock requisite to make
the road, sooner than see it fall. J. therefore did
not canvass Assumption, Ascension, St. John the
Baptist, St. James, St. Charles and Jefferson.
In a work of this magnitude, it is not to be
expected that people can come to full conclusions
at the moment; prudence, therefore dictated the
propriety of a convention from city and country,
to take place in New Orleans, on Wednesday, the
4th of June next. In the meantime, the people
will have leisure to reflect deliberately upon this
important matter. It may be proper to state, that
at the outset of my labors, I suggested to the
planters the propriety of their parishes taking
stock as parishes in this road. To accomplish
this, with a certainty of success, 1 recommended","fullrs":{},"find":"2052.jp2","dmaccess":{},"dmimage":{},"dmcreated":"2012-01-18","dmmodified":"2012-01-18","dmoclcno":{},"dmrecord":"2051","restrictionCode":"1","cdmfilesize":"522024","cdmfilesizeformatted":"0.50 MB","cdmprintpdf":"0","cdmhasocr":"1","cdmisnewspaper":"0"}
